translations.Password is expired, please use forgot p: Nenosiri limekwisha muda wake, tafadhali tumia njia ya nenosiri uliyosahau kuweka upya
translations.Password must not have been used recentl: Nenosiri lazima liwe limetumika hivi majuzi hapo awali.
translations.Password is among the 1,000,000 most com: Nenosiri ni kati ya zile 1,000,000 zinazojulikana zaidi. Tafadhali ifanye kuwa ya kipekee.
translations.Password is present in compromised passw: Nenosiri lipo katika orodha ya nenosiri iliyoathiriwa. Tafadhali chagua nenosiri tofauti.
translations.Password needs to be at least %s charact: Nenosiri linahitaji kuwa na urefu wa angalau vibambo %s.
translations.Password needs to contain at least one n: Nenosiri linahitaji kuwa na angalau herufi moja ya nambari.
translations.Password needs to contain at least one s: Nenosiri linahitaji kuwa na angalau herufi moja maalum.
translations.Password needs to contain at least one l: Nenosiri linahitaji kuwa na angalau herufi moja ndogo na moja kubwa.
translations.Allows admins to configure a password po: Inaruhusu wasimamizi kusanidi sera ya nenosiri
translations.Allow admin to define certain pre-condit: Ruhusu msimamizi kufafanua masharti fulani ya awali ya nenosiri, k.m. kutekeleza urefu wa chini
translations.Number of passwords to keep (securely ha: Idadi ya manenosiri ya kuweka (hashed kwa usalama) ili kuzuia watumiaji kutumia tena manenosiri yaliyotumika hapo awali.
translations.Number of login attempts before the user: Idadi ya majaribio ya kuingia kabla ya akaunti ya mtumiaji kuzimwa hadi hatua ya kibinafsi ichukuliwe. (0 bila kikomo)
translations.Please note, this option is meant to pro: Tafadhali kumbuka, chaguo hili linakusudiwa kulinda akaunti zilizoshambuliwa. Akaunti zilizozimwa lazima ziwashwe tena na usimamizi. Wavamizi wanaojaribu kukisia manenosiri ya akaunti anwani zao za IP zitazuiwa na ulinzi wa bruteforce bila mpangilio huu.
translations.Number of days until user password expir: Idadi ya siku hadi nenosiri la mtumiaji kuisha
translations.Warning: enabling password expiration is: Onyo: kuwezesha kuisha kwa nenosiri siku hizi kunachukuliwa kuwa hatari ya usalama na mashirika kadhaa ya usalama.
translations.Minimum password length: Urefu wa chini kabisa wa nenosiri
translations.Check password against the list of breac: Angalia nenosiri dhidi ya orodha ya manenosiri yaliyokiukwa kutoka kwa haveibeenpwned.com
translations.This check creates a hash of the passwor: Cheki hiki huunda heshi ya nenosiri na kutuma herufi 5 za kwanza za heshi hii kwa API ya haveibeenpwned.com ili kupata orodha ya heshi zote zinazoanza na hizo. Kisha huangalia mfano wa Nextcloud ikiwa heshi ya nenosiri iko kwenye seti ya matokeo.
translations.Minimal length has to be a non negative: Urefu mdogo lazima uwe nambari isiyo hasi
translations.History size has to be a non negative nu: Ukubwa wa historia lazima iwe nambari isiyo hasi
translations.Expiration days have to be a non negativ: Siku za mwisho wa matumizi lazima ziwe nambari isiyo hasi
translations.Maximum login attempts have to be a non: Upeo wa majaribio ya kuingia lazima uwe nambari isiyo hasi
